summary: WHILE DRIVING DOWN THE STREET I LIVE ON, ALL DASH INSTRUMENT PANEL SHUT DOWN.  I HAVE NO GAS, SPEEDOMETER, MILEAGE, DIRECTIONAL FEEDBACK OR ANY INFORMATION THAT IS ON THE  DASHBOARD AVAILABLE.  I AM NOW UNABLE TO DRIVE MY VEHICLE AS IT IS UNSAFE TO DRIVE WITHOUT KNOWING HOW FAST YOU ARE GOING OR HOW MUCH GAS IS IN YOUR CAR.
